== Colvale (CT) (626691) ==

Colvale (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 10.72 sq. km. and harbouring 1147 households with total population of 4818 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 2425 and female population is 2393. Scheduled Caste population is 15 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the town is 626691<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 180 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 459 km. Railway station is at TIVIM at a distance of 8 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 600 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MAPUSA (8 km) .
